name: Slippery Rock Area Joint School Board v. Rieger et al., Appellants

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
The judgment entered in the court below is affirmed.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Slippery Rock Area Joint School Board v. Rieger et al., Appellants.
Argued March 19, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Boic, and MoBbide, JJ.
Lee C. McGandless, with him Elder W. Marshall, John P. Davis, Jr., and Reed, Smith, Shaw & McClay, for appellants.
George P. Kiester, with him Eiester, Coulter & Gilchrist, for appellee.
May 8, 1959:
